thread.title: EEOC says contractor’s test unfair to women
thread.title_full: EEOC says contractor’s test unfair to women

author: Brian Johnson
title: EEOC says contractor’s test unfair to women
text:
Home / News / Construction & Development / EEOC says contractor’s test unfair to women The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission has dealt a setback to the use of a pre-employment test favored by some contractors. EEOC says contractor’s test unfair to women By: Brian Johnson September 24, 2015 7:00 am 0 The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission has dealt a setback to the use of a pre-employment test favored by some contractors.
